STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: 装備しているクリーチャーは+2/+2の修正を受ける。
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Power_Add( 2 ) parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Toughness_Add( 2 ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Whenever a creature dealt damage by equipped creature this turn dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control. Attach Scythe of the Wretched to that creature.

Ogniqualvolta una creatura a cui è stato inflitto danno dalla creatura equipaggiata in questo turno viene messa in un cimitero, rimetti in gioco quella carta sotto il tuo controllo. Assegna la Falce del Corruttore a quella creatura.

Immer wenn eine Kreatur, der in diesem Zug Schaden durch die ausgerüstete Kreatur zugefügt wurde, auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, bringe diese Karte unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel zurück. Lege die Sense der Verdammten an diese Kreatur an.

À chaque fois qu'une créature, ayant subi ce tour-ci des blessures d'une créature équipée, est mise dans un cimetière, renvoyez cette carte en jeu sous votre contrôle. Attachez la Faux des misérables à cette créature.
Siempre que una criatura que recibió daño de la criatura equipada este turno sea puesta en un cementerio, regresa esa carta al juego bajo tu control. Anexa la Guadaña del Maldito a esa criatura.
いずれかのクリーチャーが、装備しているクリーチャーにダメージを与えられたターンに墓地に置かれるたび、そのカードをあなたのコントロール下で場に戻す。 卑劣漢の大鎌をそのクリーチャーにつける。
Whenever a creature dealt damage by equipped creature this turn dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control. Attach Scythe of the Wretched to that creature.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by equipped creature this turn dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control. Attach Scythe of the Wretched to that creature.
Toda vez que uma criatura que sofreu dano causado pela criatura equipada for colocada num cemitério, devolva aquele card para o jogo sob seu controle. Anexe Foice do Sevo àquela criatura.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: local parent = Object():GetParent() if (TriggerObject():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and TriggerObject() ~= nil and parent ~= nil) then if MTG():Interrogate_DamageDealtToCreatureThisTurn( parent, TriggerObject() ) > 0 then return true end end return false
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = TriggerObject() ObjectDC():Free_Compartment(1) if (target_card ~= nil) then ObjectDC():Set_CardPtr(1, target_card) ObjectDC():Protect_CardPtr(1) target_card:PutIntoPlay(EffectController()) end

local target_card = ObjectDC():Get_CardPtr(1) if (EffectSource() ~= nil and target_card ~= nil) then if target_card:GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 then EffectSource():Attach( target_card ) end end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) -- AI 'cannot reequip' exemption local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil and EffectController():IsAI() ~= 0 then filter:SetCardInstance(parent) filter:AddExtra(FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE) end
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if (target_card ~= nil and EffectSource() ~= nil) then EffectSource():Attach( target_card ) end
